Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Shafer "M.S."
Reviews.Content: Love this compact camera!  Takes great pics, easy to use & with the little case i bought, it clips right to my belt loop.  Tried other brands & i always come back sony cyber-shot!  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Good quality pictures with the 12 MP
Reviews.Author: J. Sisler "Joy Smith"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small 12 MP digital camera and found this Sony Cybershot - the pictures are great quality.It's not quite as user friendly as I expected it to be, but all in all, it's a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Steve "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Received product fast and in perfect condition. Sony Cybershot is one of the best digital cameras made.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor
4x optical zoom lens
Large 2.7" lCD display
Face Detection technology captures faces naturally
SteadyShot image stabilization
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cybershot DSC-S980 12MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot Image Stabilization (Pink)
